required_for.description: You have immunity to fire damage.
required_for.name: Coal Walker

requires.description: CHA vs AC, 1d6 fire damage
requires.name: Firebolt

required_for.description: Whenever you hit with a melee attack, you can use any powers from the Debuff tree as a reaction.
required_for.name: Spellstrike

requires.description: For 5 ticks, you may push or pull a target 5 feet.  An unwilling target must succeed on an Athletics roll to avoid the movement.
requires.name: Telekinetic Shove

required_for.description: You can move and attack on the same turn.  You pay the full tick cost
required_for.name: Charge

required_for.description: When you finish a long rest, roll 3d6 and record the numbers rolled. You can replace any attack roll, saving throw, or ability check made by you or a creature that you can see with the foretelling rolls. You must choose to do so before the roll.
required_for.name: Portent

requires.description: You bind a small spirit to obey your commands.  The spirit lasts for 1 hour, and can be commanded as a 5 tick action.  It cannot attack, but can perform minor actions a human servant would.  It has 1 hit point
requires.name: Unseen Servant

required_for.description: You can communicate telepathically with creatures you are aware of that have language and are within 30 feet of you
required_for.name: Telepathy

required_for.description: Choose a target that can see or hear you and make a Power roll. On a success, the target is unaware of anything but you.
required_for.name: Entrancing Gaze

required_for.description: You can temporarily alter the physical properties of one nonmagical object, changing it from one substance into another. You perform a special alchemical procedure on one object composed entirely of wood, stone (but not a gemstone), iron, copper, or silver, transforming it into a different one of those materials. For each 10 minutes you spend performing the procedure, you can transform up to 1 cubic foot of material. After 1 hour, or until you lose your concentration (as if you were concentrating on a spell), the material reverts to its original substance.
required_for.name: Minor Alchemy

required_for.description: Whenever a creature adjacent to you takes damage, you can use your reaction to take that damage instead.
required_for.name: Bodyguard

requires.description: If your proficiency in a CHA skill is higher than an Ally's, that Ally gains advantage on that check.
requires.name: Noble Mien

requires.description: You can temporarily alter the physical properties of one nonmagical object, changing it from one substance into another. You perform a special alchemical procedure on one object composed entirely of wood, stone (but not a gemstone), iron, copper, or silver, transforming it into a different one of those materials. For each 10 minutes you spend performing the procedure, you can transform up to 1 cubic foot of material. After 1 hour, or until you lose your concentration (as if you were concentrating on a spell), the material reverts to its original substance.
requires.name: Minor Alchemy

requires.description: You have advantage on Saving Throws against forced movement.
requires.name: Stable Roots

required_for.description: If an ally has multiple sources of advantage on an attack roll, they can grant advantage to an ally's next attack, so long as that Ally is visible and within 30 feet.
required_for.name: Pass it On

requires.description: Choose a skill - you can take 10 minutes to double your proficiency with active checks in that skill
requires.name: Tool Expertise

requires.description: Choose a target that can see or hear you and make an Intimidation check. On a success against the target’s Composure defense, the target is afraid of you.
requires.name: Intimidating Presence

required_for.description: You can hide as a 5 tick action instead of a 10 tick action
required_for.name: Vanish

requires.description: If you attack with a martial melee weapon on a slow attack, add the dice together instead of taking the highest one.
requires.name: Strength of Mountains

requires.description: At the beginning of a long rest, and whenever you successfully cast an Abjuration spell, you gain an Arcane Ward. The ward has HP equal to your proficiency bonus, vulnerability to all damage, and you can use your reaction to interpose it against any attack within 30 feet.
requires.name: Arcane Ward

required_for.description: You can make a ranged attack with disadvantage.  If you hit, it is a critical hit.
required_for.name: Sharp Shooting

requires.description: Choose a creature within 30 feet. You get +1d6 to damage rolls against it.  Only one creature can have your mark on it at a time.
requires.name: Hunter’s Mark

requires.description: You gain advantage on CHA checks.  Interacting with creatures in this way clearly influences them magically, and they will react as such 1 minute after the interaction
requires.name: Friends

required_for.description: So long as you don't move on your turn, you can use a bonus action to gain advantage on an attack against a creature you attacked last round.
required_for.name: Take Aim

required_for.description: If no allies are adjacent to or attacking an enemy, you have advantage on melee attacks against that enemy.
required_for.name: Dueling

requires.description: Make a Dexterity roll. On a success against the Wisdom defenses of everyone within 30 feet, everyone’s attention is drawn to a point you choose within range.
requires.name: Distracting Trick

required_for.description: You may attempt a DC 18 Medicine check. If you succeed, a target you touch can expend two HD to gain the benefit of healing (i.e. they only heal a number of HP equal to 1 roll of their hit die).
required_for.name: Battlefield Medicine

requires.description: Whenever an effect would allow you to spend a Hit Die, you can instead spend 1d4 instead of 2d4.
requires.name: Hit Die Splitting

required_for.description: You have advantage on Saving Throws against forced movement.
required_for.name: Stable Roots

required_for.description: You add your Charisma bonus to your initiative rolls.
required_for.name: Hot Headed

required_for.description: You may spend a hit die to impose disadvantage on an attack, Power roll, or skill check. If the action fails, the target takes damage equal to a roll of the hit die you spent.
required_for.name: Bardic Doubts

requires.description: CHA vs AC, Mind Damage
requires.name: Vicious Mockery

requires.description: You can silently communicate a single sentence to an ally who you can see and can see you
requires.name: Message

requires.description: You can make opportunity attacks with your weapon, if it's loaded, other than attacks provoked by movement.
requires.name: Crack Shot

requires.description: You can load your weapon with a special shot for 6 ticks.  If you do, your next attack targets Acrobatics, and hits everyone in a cone.  It only rolls for injury, and doesn't deal damage.
requires.name: Buckshot

required_for.description: Choose a skill, you double your proficiency bonus for active checks with that skill
required_for.name: Skill Expertise

requires.description: You gain the ability to manipulate objects at range, acting quickly and quietly.  You can only manipulate objects that weigh 5 pounds or less and are within 30 feet.  You have disadvantage on Sleight-of-Hand checks at range
requires.name: Mage Hand

required_for.description: Choose a skill - you can take 10 minutes to double your proficiency with active checks in that skill
required_for.name: Tool Expertise

requires.description: You add your Charisma bonus to your initiative rolls.
requires.name: Hot Headed

required_for.description: Allies within 5 feet of you gain advantage on Athletics, Endurance, and Composure checks.
required_for.name: Aura of Courage

requires.description: 10 ticks - your next glancing attack against the target is considered a normal hit
requires.name: True Strike

required_for.description: Whenever you kill a creature, you can use your reaction to make an Intimidating Presence check.
required_for.name: Death is Scary

required_for.description: You can conjure up an inanimate object in your hand or on the ground in an unoccupied space that you can see within 10 feet of you. This object can be no larger than 3 feet on a side and weigh no more than 10 pounds, and its form must be that of a nonmagical object that you have seen. The object is visibly magical, radiating dim light out to 5 feet.
required_for.name: Minor Conjuration

requires.description: You can move and attack on the same turn.  You pay the full tick cost
requires.name: Charge

required_for.description: Your AC is 10 + your Proficiency modifier + your Dexterity bonus.
required_for.name: Earthen Resilience

requires.description: CHA vs AC, acid damage
requires.name: Acid Splash

required_for.description: If you have cover, you can give up that cover until your next turn to gain advantage on your next attack roll.
required_for.name: Brace

required_for.description: You can make multiple attacks simultaneously, spending ticks for each.  Each attack has disadvantage.
required_for.name: Empty the Clip

requires.description: You can attempt to fire while empty.  If your attack roll is below 15+number of powers you've used, your weapon jams and can't be used for the rest of combat.  Using this ability counts as a power.
requires.name: Miscount

required_for.description: You can make opportunity attacks with your weapon, if it's loaded, other than attacks provoked by movement.
required_for.name: Crack Shot

requires.description: You may attempt a DC 18 Medicine check. If you succeed, a target you touch can expend two HD to gain the benefit of healing (i.e. they only heal a number of HP equal to 1 roll of their hit die).
requires.name: Battlefield Medicine

required_for.description: Your arcane ward is not vulnerable to an element of your choice
required_for.name: Elemental Attunement

requires.description: INT vs AC, targets each creature around you.  Inflicts an injury, but deals no damage
requires.name: Thunderclap

required_for.description: At the beginning of a long rest, and whenever you successfully cast an Abjuration spell, you gain an Arcane Ward. The ward has HP equal to your proficiency bonus, vulnerability to all damage, and you can use your reaction to interpose it against any attack within 30 feet.
required_for.name: Arcane Ward

required_for.description: Whenever a creature with one of your spells on it dies, you can spend a Hit Die.
required_for.name: Grim Harvest

requires.description: INT vs AC, Cold damage.  You can forgo the damage to instead inflict the speed halved injury
requires.name: Frostbite

requires.description: Whenever there are more allies than enemies adjacent to an enemy creature, that creature has disadvantage on attack rolls.
requires.name: Distracting Flanker

requires.description: STR vs AC.  If you hit the target, you can make an attack as a reaction if it attacks anyone else on its turn, or if it leaves your threat range
requires.name: Booming Blade

requires.description: When you drop to 0 HP or gain the "Death" injury, you do not fall unconscious, though you still make death saving throws.  All your actions have disadvantage, and all actions against you have advantage.
requires.name: Too Stupid to Die

requires.description: So long as you don't move on your turn, you can use a bonus action to gain advantage on an attack against a creature you attacked last round.
requires.name: Take Aim

required_for.description: When you drop to 0 HP or gain the "Death" injury, you do not fall unconscious, though you still make death saving throws.  All your actions have disadvantage, and all actions against you have advantage.
required_for.name: Too Stupid to Die

required_for.description: If you attack with a martial melee weapon on a slow attack, add the dice together instead of taking the highest one.
required_for.name: Strength of Mountains

requires.description: Make an attack roll using Strength against a target within range. If you glance, you can give up other glancing effects to reduce armor style by one.
requires.name: Sundering Strike

required_for.description: You can spend your hit dice to heal others.
required_for.name: Lay on Hands

requires.description: You can make medicine checks to stabilize creatures as a 5 tick action
requires.name: Spare the Dying

required_for.description: Whenever there are more allies than enemies adjacent to an enemy creature, that creature has disadvantage on attack rolls.
required_for.name: Distracting Flanker

requires.description: You can conjure up an inanimate object in your hand or on the ground in an unoccupied space that you can see within 10 feet of you. This object can be no larger than 3 feet on a side and weigh no more than 10 pounds, and its form must be that of a nonmagical object that you have seen. The object is visibly magical, radiating dim light out to 5 feet.
requires.name: Minor Conjuration

requires.description: You can communicate telepathically with creatures you are aware of that have language and are within 30 feet of you
requires.name: Telepathy
